articles.author: George Smith
articles.title: Erik ten Hag could hand out a Man Utd debut in Europa League fixture vs Betis - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man United manager Erik ten Hag could be brave enough to ring the changes against Real Betis.
articles.content:
Sandwiched between two disappointing Premier League results, Manchester United took a giant stride towards the quarter-finals of the Europa League last Thursday evening.
Just four days after being e… [+4253 chars]
